Posts.Content: MomOf3AwesomeKids wrote: Hi, I am going for a Stereotactic Biopsy on Tuesday. I had my yearly mammo done and I was called back for a diagnostic Mammo and ultrasound.Â  I then was told that I need a biopsy. I have still not yet talked to any Drs...just the imaging place to make appointments.So, I decided to go and pick up my reports to see what is going on. This is what my report says: Increased soft tissue density and approximately 3.8 x 2.1 cm area of prominently increased number of mostly pleomorphic microcalcifications in the anterior periareolar upper-outer right breast. zthere are mildly dilated ducts in retroareolar region. Abnormal echogenicity such as abnormal acoustical shadowing is seen. There is suggested dense fibroglandular tissue in the area evaluated. Stereotactic needle biopsy recommended. Can anyone give me any insight? Please... I am going bonkers :/ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Needle Biopsy MomOf3AwesomeKids MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: MomOf3AwesomeKids wrote: Thanks everyone for helping me get through the waiting game! I got the call today that I have fibrocystic change and just need follow up in 6 months! I hope everyone else waiting gets B9 also! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My results are B9 MomOf3AwesomeKids jushavinfun
